header_contributing: Feel free to make a PR to suggest a new conference, please take a quick look at the [contribution guidelines](.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) first. Thank you to all [contributors](https://github.com/AwesomeMobileConferences/awesome-mobile-conferences/graphs/contributors); you rock!
